name: Userstyles.org - Simple dark [by Splark]
description: Dark. Customizable background. Now with more bokeh. Some buttons easier to click. Transparency pops up on hover. [beta]
additional_info:
Ads
  • [unchanged ads] Ads are not removed, but some text-based ads are darkened. Jason Barnabe is toasty warm at night.
  • [hover-activate ads] Ads are mostly hidden but can be activated on hover. Jason Barnabe eats corn flakes and never gets frostbite.
  • [remove ads] Completely removes site ads. Jason Barnabe eats cold grass.
